markdownRemark.html:
Top page for each component

These components have all been tested with Payara 41

From the top page of each component go to the release you want -- normally the highest number as listed below. Â You can find release notes, installation instructions and the distribution in addition to user and developer documentation.

  • authn.anon -- 3.0.0
  • authn.db -- 3.0.0
  • authn.ldap -- 3.0.0
  • authn.simple -- 3.0.0
  • authn.oidc -- 2.0.1
  • icat.server -- 6.0.0
  • icat.client -- 6.0.0
  • icat.lucene -- 2.0.2
  • icat.oaipmh -- 2.0.1
  • ids.server -- 2.0.0
  • ids.client -- 1.3.0
  • ids.plugin -- 2.0.0
  • ids.storage_file -- 1.4.4
  • topcat -- 2.4.9

Issues with the current releases

  • IDS
    • If you choose to use the IDS client without maven you will need to locate three extra jars to add to your classpath. For convenience they are available below
      • jackson-core-2.2.0.jar
      • jackson-annotations-2.2.0.jar
      • jackson-databind-2.2.0.jar
